maqras.text: 44|17|tatha hamane pareeksha lee inase poorv firaun kee jaati kee tatha unake paas ek aadaraneey rasool aaya.
44|18|ki mujhe saump do allaah ke bhakton ko. nishchay main tumhaare lie ek amaanatadaar rasool hoon.
44|19|tatha allaah ke vipareet ghamand na karo. main tumhaare saamane khula pramaan prastut karata hoon.
44|20|tatha mainne sharan lee hai, apane paalanahaar kee tatha tumhaare paalanahaar kee isase ki tum mujhapar patharaav kar do.
44|21|aur yadi tum mera vishvaas na karo, to mujhase pare ho jao.
44|22|antatah, moosa ne pukaara apane paalanahaar ko, ki vaastav mein ye log aparaadhee hain.
44|23|(hamane aadesh diya) ki nikal ja raaton-raat, mere bhakton ko lekar. nishchay tumhaara peechha kiya jaayega.
44|24|tatha chhod de saagar ko usakee dasha par, khula. vaastav mein, ye doob jaane vaalee sena hai.
44|25|ve chhod gaye bahut-se baag tatha jal srot.
44|26|tatha khetiyaan aur sukhadaayee sthaan.
44|27|tatha sukh ke saadhan, jinamen ve aannad le rahe the.
44|28|isee praakaar hua aur hamane unaka uttaraadhikaaree bana diya doosare[1] logon ko.
44|29|to nahin roya unapar aakaash aur na dharatee aur na unhen avasar (samay) diya gaya.
44|30|tatha hamane bacha liya israeel kee santaan ko, apamaanakaaree yaatana se.
44|31|firaun se. vaastav mein, vah chadha hua ullanghanakaariyon mein se tha.
44|32|tatha hamane pradhaanata dee unhen, jaanate hue, sansaar vaasiyon par.
44|33|tatha hamane unhen pradaan keen aisee nishaaniyaan, jinamen khulee pareeksha thee.
44|34|vaastav mein, ye[1] kahate hain ki
44|35|hamen to bas pratham baar marana hai tatha ham phir jeevit nahin kiye jaayenge.
44|36|phir yadi tum sachche ho, to hamaare poorvajon ko (jeevit karake) la do.
44|37|ye achchhe hain athava tubb kee jaati[1] tatha jo unase poorv rahe hain? hamane unaka vinaash kar diya. nishchay ve aparaadhi the.
44|38|tatha hamane aakaashon aur dharatee ko evan jo kuchh un donon ke beech hai, khel nahin banaaya hai.
44|39|hamane nahin paida kiya hai un donon ko, parantu saty ke aadhaar par. kintu adhiktar log ise nahin jaanate hain.
44|40|nihsandeh nirnay[1] ka din, un sabaka nishchit samay hai.
44|41|jis din, koee saathee kisee saathee ke kuchh kaam nahin aayega aur na unakee sahaayata kee jaayegee.
44|42|parantu, jisapar allaah kee daya ho jaaye, to vaastav mein vah bada prabhaavashaalee, dayaavaan hai.
44|43|nihsandeh zakkoom (thohad) ka vrksh.
44|44|paapiyon ka bhojan hai.
44|45|pighale hue taanbe jaisa, jo khaulega peton mein.
44|46|garm paanee ke khaulane ke samaan.
44|47|(aadesh hoga ki) use pakado tatha dhakka dete hue narak ke beech tak pahuncha do.
44|48|phir bahao usake sir ke oopar atyant garm jal kee yaatana.
44|49|(tatha kaha jaayega ki) chakh, kyonki too bada aadaraneey sammaanit tha.
44|50|yahee vah cheez hai, jisamen tum sandeh kar rahe the.
44|51|nihsandeh aagyaakaaree shaanti ke sthaan mein honge.
44|52|baagon tatha jal sroton mein.
44|53|vastr dhaaran kiye hue maheen tatha komal resham ke, ek-doosare ke saamane (aaseen) honge.
44|54|isee prakaar hoga tatha ham vivaah denge unako haooron se.
44|55|ve maang karenge usamen, pratyek prakaar ke mevon kee nishchint hokar.
44|56|ve us svarg mein maut[1] nahin chakhenge, pratham (saansaarik) maut ke siva tatha (allaah) bacha lega unhen, narak kee yaatana se.
44|57|aapake paalanahaar kee daya se, vahee badee saphalata hai.
44|58|to hamane saral kar diya is (quraan) ko aapakee bhaasha mein, taaki ve shiksha grahan karen.
44|59|atah, aap prateeksha karen,[1] ve bhee prateeksha kar rahe hain.
45|1|haaa meem.
45|2|is pustak[1] ka utarana allaah, sab cheezon aur gunon ko jaanane vaale kee or se hai.
45|3|vaastav mein, aakaashon tatha dharatee mein bahut-see nishaaniyaan (lakshan) hain, eemaan laane vaalon ke lie.
45|4|tatha tumhaaree utpatti mein tatha jo phaila[1] diye hain usane jeev, bahut-see nishaaniyaan hain, un logon ke lie, jo vishvaas rakhate hon.

45|5|tatha raat aur din ke aane jaane mein tatha allaah ne aakaash se jo jeevika utaaree hai, phir jeevit kiya hai usake dvaara dharatee ko, usake marane ke pashchaat tatha havaon ke pherane mein, badee nishaaniyaan hain, unake lie, jo samajh-boojh rakhate hon.
45|6|ye allaah kee aayaten hain, jo vaastav mein ham tumhen suna rahe hain. phir kaun see baat rah gaee hai, allaah tatha usakee aayaton ke pashchaat, jisapar ve eemaan laayenge
45|7|vinaash hai pratyek jhoothe paapee ke lie.

45|8|jo allaah kee un aayaton ko, jo usake saamane padhee jaayen sune, phir bhee vah akadata hua (kufr par) ada rahe, jaise ki unhen suna hee na ho! to aap use duhkhadaayee yaatana kee soochana pahuncha den.
45|9|aur jab, use gyaan ho hamaaree kisee aayat ka, to use upahaas bana le. yahee hain, jinake lie apamaanakaaree yaatana hai.
45|10|tatha unake aage narak hai aur nahin kaam aayega unake, jo kuchh unhonne kamaaya hai aur na jise unhonne allaah ke siva sanrakshak banaaya hai aur unheen ke lie kadee yaatana hai.
45|11|ye (quraan) maargadarshan hai tatha jinhonne kufr kiya apane paalanahaar kee aayaton ke saath, to unheen ke lie yaatana hai, duhkhadaayee yaatana.
